title: Spiral Model
subject: Software Engineering
theory:
Focuses on **Risk Reduction**. 
Combines Iterative + Waterfall. 
Four sectors: Planning, Risk Analysis, Engineering, Evaluation. 
Repeats in spirals. Good for large, complex, risky projects (NASA).

common_mistakes.correction: Risk analysis is expensive. Overkill for simple apps.

interview_questions.question: Main advantage of Spiral Model?
interview_questions.answer: Risk Handling. It identifies potential failures early via prototyping.
